sqlMap.select:
SELECT TARGET_ID as "targetId", TARGET_NAME as "targetName", TARGET_CODE as "targetCode", TARGET_CODES as "targetCodes", UNIT as "unit", TARGET_TYPE as "targetType", RANK as "rank", STATE as "state", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001
TARGET_TYPE = #node#
STATE = #state#
order by RANK asc

SELECT TARGET_ID as "targetId", TARGET_NAME as "targetName", TARGET_CODE as "targetCode", TARGET_CODES as "targetCodes", UNIT as "unit", TARGET_TYPE as "targetType", RANK as "rank", STATE as "state", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001
TARGET_TYPE like #P_ename#
STATE like #state#
order by TARGET_ID asc
SELECT TARGET_ID as "targetId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 where STATE='启用' order by TARGET_ID asc
SELECT TARGET_ID as "targetId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 order by TARGET_ID desc limit 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 ( TARGET_ID , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_CODE , TARGET_CODES , TARGET_TYPE , UNIT , RANK , STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #targetId: VARCHAR# , #targetName: VARCHAR# , #targetCode: VARCHAR# , #targetName: VARCHAR# , #targetType: VARCHAR# , #unit: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 ( TARGET_ID , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_CODE , TARGET_CODES , UNIT , TARGET_TYPE , RANK , STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #targetId: VARCHAR# , #targetName: VARCHAR# , #targetCode: VARCHAR# , #targetName: VARCHAR# , #unit: VARCHAR# , #targetType: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 ( TARGET_ID , TARGET_NAME , TARGET_CODE , TARGET_CODES , UNIT , TARGET_TYPE , RANK , STATE , REMARK ) VALUES ( #targetId: VARCHAR# , #targetName: VARCHAR# , #targetCode: VARCHAR# , #targetCode: VARCHAR# , #unit: VARCHAR# , #targetType: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${platSchema}.TDUHM4001 SET TARGET_NAME =#targetName#, TARGET_CODE =#targetCode#, TARGET_CODES =#targetCode#, UNIT =#unit#, TARGET_TYPE =#targetType#, RANK =#rank#, STATE =#state#, REMARK =#remark# WHERE TARGET_ID = #targetId#
